title: Zero-Shot Visual Deepfake Detection: Can AI Predict and Prevent Fake Content Before It's Created?
summary: Generative adversarial networks (GANs) and diffusion models have dramatically advanced deepfake technology, and its threats to digital security, media integrity, and public trust have increased rapidly. This research explored zero-shot deepfake detection, an emerging method even when the models have never seen a particular deepfake variation.
